The official dedication and installation: 2006, at the northeast corner of Bayonne Peninsula in New Jersey.
The identification of the monument as: To the Struggle Against World Terrorism" or "The Memorial at Harbor View Park" or the "Tear Drop Memorial."
The confirmation of the monument being a: designed by Russian artist Zurab Tsereteli.
The physical features of the monument: including its height of 100 feet, the presence of a jagged tear with a 40-foot stainless steel teardrop, and the inscription of the names of the 1993 World Trade Center bombing victims and the victims of the September 11, 2001 terrorist attacks.
